meanings: (접힌 것을) open, spread (out), unfold; (말린 것을) unroll

examples.korean: The story continued with a double-page spread on the inside pages. 발음듣기 그 기사는 안쪽 페이지에서 두 페이지짜리 펼침 기사로 계속 이어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The story continued with a double-page spread on the inside pages. 발음

examples.korean: a full spread advertisement in the newspaper 발음듣기 신문의 양면 펼침 광고 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: a full spread advertisement in the newspaper 발음

examples.korean: We hope that the government will turn its optimism into reality by taking timely and appropriate policies. 발음듣기 정부는 낙관적인 태도에서 벗어나 시기적절하며 알맞은 정책을 펼침으로써 현실을 직시해야 할 것이다. Neungyule
examples.english: We hope that the government will turn its optimism into reality by taking timely and appropriate policies. 발음

examples.korean: They started out by putting on unusual performances on the streets. 발음듣기 이들은 거리에서 별난 공연을 펼침으로써 활동을 시작했다. Neungyule
examples.english: They started out by putting on unusual performances on the streets. 발음

examples.korean: If the stranger approaches too close to the wearer, the dress takes a defensive position by extending several mechanical limbs on the dress. 발음듣기 만약 낯선 사람이 사용자에게 너무 가깝게 다가가면, 그 드레스는 몇 개의 기계로 팔 다리를 펼침으로써 된 방어 자세를 취합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: If the stranger approaches too close to the wearer, the dress takes a defensive position by extending several mechanical limbs on the dress. 발음
